weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Approves First-of-Its-Kind Treatment for Rare Genetic Disease
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA's approval of a novel gene therapy marks a significant advancement in treating a previously incurable genetic disorder, offering hope to affected patients and families.

stories.headline: New Study Highlights Potential Link Between Air Pollution and Asthma Exacerbations
stories.summary: Research published in the Lancet reveals a strong correlation between increased air pollution levels and a rise in asthma-related hospital admissions, underscoring the need for stricter environmental regulations.

stories.headline: CMS Proposes Changes to Medicare Advantage Plans for 2025
stories.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) announced proposed changes to Medicare Advantage plans for 2025, impacting provider reimbursements and patient access to certain services.
